bibl.title: C.A. Hope and E.R. Segnit, Ceramics from the Dakhleh Oasis. Preliminary Studies. (Occasional Paper. 1.)
bibl.note: Recueil de 7 articles. Voir notamment les études relatives à la céramique et aux fours de l'époque romaine.
Edwards W.I., C.A. Hope and E.R. Segnit, Ceramics from the Dakhleh Oasis. Preliminary Studies. (Occasional Paper. 1.)
Burwood, Victoria (Australia), Victoria College Press, 1987, 4°, [v]-106 pp., nombr. figg. et pll.
